author: Catherine Opie
title: Renowned Photographer Catherine Opie’s Favorite Things
text:
“THE LEFT-MOST SCULPTURE on the mantel was made by the artist Mary Brogger. She’s very interested in transforming objects. She inserted purple dye in the middle of this candleholder, and it slowly seeped into the plaster over three years.
“I got the ‘sinking’ ship in a bottle from a thrift shop in Sandusky, Ohio, where I grew up. I thought, How odd to see a sinking ship instead of the ship in the bottle as a perfectly enclosed thing.
...
